features: Features intricate floral patterns throughout the necklace, meticulously embellished with sparkling CZ diamonds. The central pendant boasts a prominent pear-shaped emerald surrounded by diamond-studded floral motifs. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of timeless elegance. The design is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian Haar styles, showcasing a blend of contemporary and classic aesthetics. Setting style is prong and pave.

occasions: and upscale social gatherings. This statement piece elevates any special occasion attire and embodies both tradition and modern elegance.
description: This haar offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the vibrant emerald and pearl accents add character. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. It is a statement piece that captures attention and celebrates timeless beauty, crafted by skilled artisans.
